FuncDef: This command displays information related to established S11 connections. Specific sessions can be selected based on IMSI, APN, or MME.
CLIs: s11 session [ peer-address <ip-address> ] [ router <router-instance> ] [ remote-control-teid <teid> ] [ local-control-teid <teid> ] [ detail ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IMSI (International Mobile Subscriber Identity) of this UE.
Specifies the IP address of the MME.
Specifies the identifier of the virtual router instance where the GTP tunnel is terminated.
Specifies the remote control plane Tunnel Endpoint Identifier (TEID).
Specifies the local control plane TEID.
